The code chunk is situated within the initialization process of the `LerpFunctionNoStateInterval` class, which is a subclass of `Interval`. This class is designed to execute a function over time with linear interpolation between specified start (`fromData`) and end (`toData`) values. The chunk in question initializes the superclass `Interval`, setting up the interval's name and duration.

# Initialize superclass
        Interval.Interval.__init__(self, name, duration)
